summary:
User request for SeriousDogg
Adds the \'Shadowscale Argonian\' race. A copy of the Argonian race with altered skills and Racial Abilities.
descriptionHtml:
Description
=========
User request for SeriousDogg
Adds the \'Shadowscale Argonian\' Race. A copy of the Argonian race with altered skills and Racial Abilities.

New Racial Abilities:
Shadowscales - Fortifies sneak by 15%.
The Shadow Stone - Constantly has the \'Shadow Stone\' ability.

Skills:
Sneak +10
Pickpocket +5 
Light Armor +5
One Handed +5
Archery + 5
 
Install
=======
Extract the archive.
Copy \'Shadowscale Argonian Race.esp\' to your Skyrim/Data folder.
Don\'t forget to check the data file in the launcher.

Uninstall
=========
Uncheck the data file in the launcher.
Delete \'Shadowscale Argonian Race.esp\' from your Skyrim/Data folder.

Credits
=======
Thanks to:
Bethesda for Skyrim and the CK
SeriousDogg for the concept

Legal
=====
Only vanilla assets were used.
author: Squizzo
